title: Video & Sound Gallery
description: A list of links to videos and audio from the NIH Director.
cleaned_text: December 20, 2021 — Dr. Collins and Bobby Bones talk about a range of topics including COVID-19 boosters and continuing public health measures due to the omicron surge. Dr. Collins also answers a variety of health-related topics including Botox and curing the common cold. December 19, 2021 — In an interview with CBS Sunday Morning, Dr. Collins reflects on 12 years as NIH Director, what he is most proud of, and what challenges he faced. He also shares his passion for laboratory research as well as his hobbies including music and motorcycles. Dr. Collins' wife, Diane Baker, also joins to talk about their partnership. December 17, 2021 — Dr. Collins and Frances Stead Sellers discuss a variety of topics including the importance of COVID boosters, Dr. Collins' passion for global health, and he shares what makes him optimistic for the future. December 16, 2021 — Dr. Collins and host Dr. Bapu Jena cover a range topics including, Dr. Collins decision to step down as NIH director, the potential of high-risk, high-reward research, the benefits of the public and private working together, and more.
